data.comment: The match has started at Strandvallen.
Throw-in for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
In the minute 2, Tobias Sana of Goteborg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
In the minute 4, Mjallby drive upfield and Jonathan Tamimi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goteborg defender.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goteborg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Goteborg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 8, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 9, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Mjallby throw-in in Goteborg's half.
Poya Asbaghi (Goteborg) is making a first substitution, with Victor Wernersson replacing Sebastian Eriksson.
August Erlingmark for Goteborg drives towards goal at Strandvallen. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Goteborg to take a throw-in in Mjallby territory.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Mjallby.
August Erlingmark (Goteborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 13, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 19, Goteborg have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
Throw-in high up the field for Mjallby in Hallevik.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
Can Mjallby capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goteborg's half?
Mjallby surge into the attack at Strandvallen but Max Watsonâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 23, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr gives Goteborg a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 25, Jakob Johansson instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Goteborg.
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Goteborg have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Mjallby get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goteborg's half?
In the minute 31, Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
Mjallby have a dangerous throw-in.
Mohammed Al-Hakim waits before resuming play because Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr for Goteborg is still down.
In the minute 36, Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr for Goteborg is back on the field again.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 39, Alexander Jallow (Goteborg) has received a yellow card from Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a Goteborg throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Can Goteborg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 45, Tobias Sana (Goteborg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goteborg's Tobias Sana breaks free at Strandvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Mjallby.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Hallevik.
In the minute 45, David Lofquist is booked for the home team.
The second half has started at Strandvallen.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Marcus Lantz is making the team's first substitution at Strandvallen with Kadir Hodzic replacing Jacob Bergstrom.
Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 48, Besard Sabovic of Mjallby smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Jesper Gustavsson is replacing David Batanero for the home team.
Viktor Gustafson is replacing Jonathan Tamimi for Mjallby at Strandvallen.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a throw-in for Mjallby, close to Goteborg's area.
Goteborg's Tobias Sana misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Throw-in Goteborg.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Important block from the Mjallby defence as Tobias Sana fires in a strike for Goteborg.
Throw-in for Mjallby in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
An attacking Mjallby player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 56, Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr (Goteborg) has received a first yellow card.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from David Lofquist.
In the minute 58, In Hallevik, Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr of Goteborg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goteborg in their own half.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Kristopher Da Graca (Goteborg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match at Strandvallen has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andre Calisir, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Goteborg.
In the minute 64, Besard Sabovic (Mjallby) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Mohammed Al-Hakim.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 64, Andre Calisir returns to the field for Goteborg after picking up a slight injury.
Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Goteborg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 66, In Hallevik Mjallby attack through Besard Sabovic. The finish is off target, however.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Goteborg a goal kick.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg.
In the minute 68, Goteborg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goteborg advance rapidly upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim blows for offside.
Kadir Hodzic (Mjallby) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 71, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Goteborg.
Tobias Sana (Goteborg) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 72, Goteborg's Tobias Sana gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hallevik.
Mjallby's Moses Ogbu has been booked in Hallevik.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
In the minute 74, Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Mjallby are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 77, Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Moses Ogbu for Mjallby gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Goteborg at Strandvallen.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Jakob Johansson with Alexander Farnerud.
In Hallevik a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Mamudo Moro is on a sub for David Lofquist for Mjallby.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Goteborg close to the penalty box.
Mjallby needs to be cautious. Goteborg have an attacking throw-in.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hallevik.
Throw-in for Goteborg at Strandvallen.
In the minute 83, Goteborg make their third substitution with Sargon Abraham replacing Patrik Karlsson Lagemyr.
Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Goteborg.
In the minute 85, Goteborg push upfield but Mohammed Al-Hakim quickly pulls them for offside.
Mohammed Al-Hakim signals a free kick to Goteborg just outside Mjallby's area.
Max Watson for Mjallby has been booked by Mohammed Al-Hakim and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 88, Tobias Sana (Goteborg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Goteborg.
Mjallby awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, At Strandvallen, August Erlingmark has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Mjallby in Hallevik.
Mjallby's Besard Sabovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goteborg defender.
Free kick for Goteborg in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Mohammed Al-Hakim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Goteborg in the half of Mjallby.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Goteborg territory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
